name: The ninth incarnation. Lizard.
description:
One day you open your eyes, and you're a lizard. That's how you live as a lizard.

The life of a lizard is one continuous adventure on a wave of despondency. You're running somewhere. There are so many thoughts that their multiple overlapping gives a very distant idea of what is happening in the world around. 

Focus. Food. Running. Sleep. Back, Focus... for many years!

One day I saw a rock painting. Thoughts multiplied. I resonated with the cave and plunged into the knowledge of ancient meanings. Frozen…
